page.title: 06TWO OF FLEET'S SCHOOLS
page.content:
{Heatherside Junior School}first started in 1967. It moved to the present buildings in 1970, when there were 700 children. As the birth-rate has gone down, there are now only 375 children in this school.There are 14 teachers and the Headmaster, Mr.Lax. The school has extended since it first started, the Infant School has been built during this time.
{Courtmoor Comprehensive School} celebrated its Silver Jubilee in 1985. Originally there were almost 600 pupils, now there are over 1,100. Several new buildings have been built including a Sports Hall. Pupils study a wide range of subjects including Computer Knowledge, Science and Craft & Design Technology. Pupils leave here when sixteen years old and can go on to a{Sixth Form or Technical College.}
